        T offset(Point offset)
        Offsets the primitive in x as well as in y axis direction.

        Example:
        original primitive myBuilder.offset(new Point(.25, .5)) =
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset in drawing units.
        Returns:
        The builder itself (fluent interface pattern).
